text: (irai) tutar. Tam iraivanitamiruntu tamakku arulapperratai nampukirar; (avvare) muhminkalum (nampukinranar; ivarkal) yavarum allahvaiyum, avanutaiya malakkukalaiyum, avanutaiya vetankalaiyum, avanutaiya tutarkalaiyum nampukirarkal. "Nam irai tutarkalil evar oruvaraiyum pirittu verrumai parattuvatillai (enrum) innum nankal cevimatuttom; (un kattalaikalukku) nankal valippattom; enkal iraivane! Unnitame mannippuk korukirom; (nankal) miluvatum unnitametan" enru kurukirarkal
